title: adjunct_tort_plot_dp_align
description: Tool to display the rigid-body alignment parameters from TORTOISE's DIFFPREP, useful for analyzing subject motion in DWI data.

align_params.title: Alignment Parameters File
align_params.description: Text file containing 6 columns of data for the rigid-body alignment parameters estimated by DIFFPREP.

enorm_file.title: Enorm File
enorm_file.description: Text file with 1 column of data, the Euclidean norm of the differences of the rigid body alignment parameters.

plot_jpg.title: Plot Image (JPG)
plot_jpg.description: A plot of enorm and the alignment parameters in JPG format.

plot_svg.title: Plot Image (SVG)
plot_svg.description: A plot of enorm and the alignment parameters in SVG format.
